destinations.name: Dominican Republic
entryDocuments: Valid passport with at least 6 months validity
destinations.eTicketInfo: Complete your e-ticket online and present proof at check-in.
destinations.covidGuidelines: Proof of vaccination or a negative COVID-19 test may be required.
destinations.notes: Visa-free for most visitors for stays up to 90 days.

destinations.name: Costa Rica
destinations.eTicketInfo: Costa Rica does not require an e-ticket; travel insurance is strongly recommended.
destinations.covidGuidelines: Proof of vaccination and a negative test result are advised.
destinations.notes: Tourists can stay visa-free for up to 90 days.
